channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP TripAdvisor Review Slider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP TripAdvisor Review Slider

item.title: CVE-2023-6037|2024-08-02T08:21:17.099Z -- unknown -- wp%20tripadvisor%20review%20slider
item.description: The WP TripAdvisor Review Slider WordPress plugin before 11.9 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2023-0261|2024-08-02T05:02:44.086Z -- unknown -- wp%20tripadvisor%20review%20slider
item.description: The WP TripAdvisor Review Slider WordPress plugin before 10.8 does not properly sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by users with a role as low as subscriber.
